Name: Soldier Matt Sowards
About the game: Fight Enemies as Matt Sowards! Ported from Mobile! Soldier up! and Gear up! Soldier Matt Sowards is a fun plat-former I made to challenge myself & others. Enjoy a Free Fun Endless Shooter with levels and many enemies to face off! Play endless fun in this combat force in a 2D World! - Fight Enemies as Matt Sowards! - Endless Levels to Play - Soldier up! Gear up! and BATTLE THE COURSE! Game was developed as my first app for Iphone using Xcode software.
